molecular_weight.title: Molecular Weight Calculator
molecular_weight.description:
Given a molecular formula as a string, calculate its molecular weight in g/mol.

**Atomic weights to use:**
- H: 1.008
- C: 12.011
- N: 14.007
- O: 15.999
- S: 32.065

**Rules:**
- Elements are represented by their symbols (H, C, O, etc.)
- Numbers after elements indicate quantity (H2O means 2 H atoms, 1 O atom)
- If no number is given, assume quantity is 1
molecular_weight.constraints: Formula will only contain H, C, N, O, S and numbers

element_counter.title: Element Counter
element_counter.description:

ph_calculator.title: pH Calculator
ph_calculator.description:
Calculate pH given hydrogen ion concentration [H+] in mol/L.

**Formula:** pH = -log10([H+])

**Rules:**

- Use the logarithm base 10
- Return pH rounded to 2 decimal places
